page.title: 19BARGOED - COMMUNITY LIFE
page.content: COMMUNITY LIFE IN THE BARGOED AREA. In the tradition of South Wales many of the community groups owe their existence to the chapels and churches. Although chapel attendance has declined, the chapels still work hard with youngsters, especially in the smaller communities of Aberbargoed and Gilfach. In Gilfach the community life of the young people is dominated by the Y.M.C.A. while in Aberbargoed the Royal Rangers organisation is active in the Ruhamah Church, both groups aiming at physical, mental, social and spiritual development. These community groups may take on an even greater importance as the work/leisure situation is bound to slant more towards leisure in the future.
